languages.text: Среди серфов появился странный культ машинопоклонников. Они разбирают механизмы на производствах и внедряют их детали в свое тело, как нелепые "аугментации".
A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.
languages.original_text: Среди серфов появился странный культ машинопоклонников. Они разбирают механизмы на производствах и внедряют их детали в свое тело, как нелепые "аугментации".

traits.locale_text: A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.
An unknown mirage has taken hold of people — crazed serfs are smashing sacred machines all over the world!
A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.
An unknown hallucination has taken hold of people — crazed serfs are smashing sacred machines all over the world!
A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.
A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.
A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.
A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.
A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.

languages.text: Un étrange culte d'adorateurs des machines est apparu parmi les ouvriers, qui se sont mis à démanteler des mécanismes industriels pour implanter les pièces ainsi récupérées dans leurs propres organismes comme autant de parodies d'« augmétiques ».
languages.original_text: A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.

traits.locale_text: Un étrange culte d'adorateurs des machines est apparu parmi les ouvriers, qui se sont mis à démanteler des mécanismes industriels pour implanter les pièces ainsi récupérées dans leurs propres organismes comme autant de parodies d'« augmétiques ».

languages.text: 機械を崇拝する奇妙なカルト集団が労働者の中に出現した。彼らは工業用機械を分解し、その部品を奇抜な「オーグメティック」として自分たちの体に埋め込んでいる。
languages.original_text: A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.

traits.locale_text: 機械を崇拝する奇妙なカルト集団が労働者の中に出現した。彼らは工業用機械を分解し、その部品を奇抜な「オーグメティック」として自分たちの体に埋め込んでいる。

languages.text: 工人阶层之中出现了一支古怪的教派。他们崇拜机械，将工业机器的零件拆解下来，作为荒诞的“植入物”植入自己体内。
languages.original_text: A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.

traits.locale_text: 工人阶层之中出现了一支古怪的教派。他们崇拜机械，将工业机器的零件拆解下来，作为荒诞的“植入物”植入自己体内。

languages.text: Un extraño culto de adoradores de máquinas se ha extendido entre los trabajadores. Desarticulan mecanismos industriales y se implantan las piezas en sus cuerpos a modo de «auméticos» ridículos.
languages.original_text: A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.

traits.locale_text: Un extraño culto de adoradores de máquinas se ha extendido entre los trabajadores. Desarticulan mecanismos industriales y se implantan las piezas en sus cuerpos a modo de «auméticos» ridículos.

languages.text: Unter den Arbeitern hat sich ein sonderbarer Kult verbreitet, der Maschinen anbetet. Der Kult zerlegt industrielle Mechanismen und implantiert sich die Bauteile als hanebüchene "Augmentationen".
languages.original_text: A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.

traits.locale_text: Unter den Arbeitern hat sich ein sonderbarer Kult verbreitet, der Maschinen anbetet. Der Kult zerlegt industrielle Mechanismen und implantiert sich die Bauteile als hanebüchene "Augmentationen".

languages.text: İşçiler arasında makineye tapan tuhaf bir tarikat ortaya çıktı. Sınai mekanizmaları parçalarına ayırarak bu parçaları bedenlerine akıl almaz "ogmetikler" olarak yerleştiriyorlar.
languages.original_text: A strange cult of machine worshippers has appeared among the workers. They disassemble industrial mechanisms and implant the parts as preposterous "augmetics" inside their bodies.
